website_summaries.verdict: A unique aquarium at its price point with sturdy, curved glass, but some may find themselves replacing the filter with a slimmer design within a few weeks.
pros: Curved glass is an attractive bonus feature for most owners, and is thick enough to ensure the tank remains sturdy
Adjustable filter is helpful for keeping small fish from tiring out against current
cons: Reports of filter failing after a few weeks of use
Rear chamber is cramped and difficult to clean
No holes in lid for heater cord

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tank for an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: I am no fish/tank expert. I was looking for a reasonably sized tank that was good looking and would be a good fit for my Betta. I bought the 3 gallon version (the 5 gallon is simply taller.) Clean lines, modern aesthetic, really good looking tank for at work and/or at home. The pump does blow my Betta around, even at the lowest setting, as other reviews have noted, so I disconnected it. (The tank size and fish type don't really call for a pump in my case.) Unboxing was great, set up was easy and I've had zero issues after a week of use. The look is well above average and the price is right! Very happy! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Revolu23

customer_reviews.title: False advertising, Product Dimensions says 12 × 12 × ...
customer_reviews.text: False advertising, Product Dimensions says 12 × 12 × 12.5 but its really 9.5 × 9.5 × 9 inches tall.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Cuoco

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality
customer_reviews.text: This tank makes a great pico setup saltwater or freshwater. I have this setup for a reef tank, so modifications were needed, but the setup as is (minus the light) is perfect for a freshwater setup. Pro: - Very good quality build. - Thick sleeve curved glass deign - High quality Glass cover! - Optional foot stand - Very quiet stock pump Cons: - cheap low quality stock light - cramped back chamber I upgraded the stock pump with an Aquatop NP-302. Fits perfect in the back chanber. also with almost any of these kit tanks you need to upgrade the lighting they give you. Its normally always crappy.
customer_reviews.author: hryder77

customer_reviews.title: Nice little aquarium for kids
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this received 4 stars because the filter that was sent had tiny black worms in it. Once we bought other replacement filters I was ok with it. No issues or weird worms since! Thankfully we did not put Zombie in it before that happened. Other than that it is a perfect little tank. We have a small glow fish in it and he enjoys it. The filtration system keeps it clear and the blacklight really pops out the glow accesories we bought.
customer_reviews.author: FrableFamilyof9

customer_reviews.title: Great shrimp tank!
customer_reviews.text: Great for a shrimp tank! Only downside is the lower right corner has an opening that the shrimp would constantly crawl through. However, I covered this with a Java moss on a square piece of metal. I bought a heater for this and my shrimp have been breeding with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: jerry8O8

customer_reviews.title: suction is way too strong for a betta fish
customer_reviews.text: I personally wouldn't recommend the 3 gallon tank. The suction is extremely powerful and my betta was not able to swim properly because he kept getting swept away by the current. The temperature of the water is also pretty hard to regulate. Bettas should not be kept in waters higher than 86 degrees F, and it was hard to prevent that with a tank this small. The 5 gallon tank has a guage that allows you to reduce the flow of the suction and the larger size made it easier to regulate temperature and water parameters. It was actually cheaper for some reason too.
customer_reviews.author: seattle96

customer_reviews.title: Great starter aquarium
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, quiet, easy to set up fish tank. The filter is slightly too powerful for the volume of the tank. The cover and light work well. Would buy another. If you are new to aquariums and plan to start with this kit, also purchase: 1) A submersible heater — about 25W 2) About 3 pounds of aquarium gravel 3) Some decorations 4) Fish food and water conditioner 5) Fish! Eventually you will need replacement filter cartridges. Optional things you might also purchase: Aquarium thermometer Air pump and air stone Tank starter bacteria Live plants (low-tech ones) Aquarium fish net
customer_reviews.author: JCS

customer_reviews.title: Great little tank for my betta
customer_reviews.text: This tank is perfect for a little betta fish. The filter pump can be adjusted low enough that it isn't too strong for my fish at least. I love that I can hide the heater in the back pump area and keep the visible part of the tank clutter free. The light isn't super bright but it gets the job done for sure. I really appreciate the quality and thickness of the glass. It makes the tank feel very premium for $60.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up...
customer_reviews.text: Had it up and running in minutes. A little challenging adjusting the water flow once you have everything in place. I ended up taking out a gallon of water to prevent spills and then removing the pump to make the adjustment. Love the little divot for my heater cord! Sadly my cord is a bit big for it but it still essentially works so it's good. Love the look! At first I was put off by the black background, but my fish really seems to feel more secure as if he has a solid wall behind him, so I think it's good. Happy with glass, easier to keep clean and doesn't mar up so easily. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: caeden

customer_reviews.title: Cute but to dark
customer_reviews.text: Over all it is a cute small tank but even with light on still on the dark side , as for the lid so so great ( I've seen better ) the one thing that cheapens it is the fact that they used a very wide black tape that wraps around the filter area so you don't see the filter... frosted sides and a white background would be a big improvement. It is quite. I might recommend it if they brightened it up but at this point I would not...Sorry but this is my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Kitties 💕 Friend Always 🐈

customer_reviews.title: Betta tank advisory
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t put a sponge filter thingy over the out-take part where the water goes into the aquarium your betta will hide and not move around because the current is so high. Once you fix that the only other issue I’ve had on two of my tanks is the piece in the back that connects to the final outtake part will break and you have to connect the first part to the last skipping the middle piece that breaks. It’s not a huge deal. The only other thing is bubbles appear on the top underside of the glass. I still love this affordable tank. You just need to know what I’ve stated above
customer_reviews.author: Jason MP

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tank.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second MarineLand tank. Very well made. With both I’ve had trouble with the back lid that’s supposed to fit flush over the pump compartment. It doesn’t have enough room for the cables needed to power the pump and the heater without raising it. That interferes with the light and with sliding the glass top back. So I’ve ended up removing it. Problem solved - except bugs fly in there. I’ve found that unless a heater with a pump is installed, the pump that comes with the tank is very fast, even on the lowest setting. My betta wasn’t thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: NC mountain gal

customer_reviews.title: Very sleek design, be careful if you have a beta.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's bedroom. He loves it. The disign is very sleek looking. I'm a little nervous about the light bar, as I'm not sure it is replacable, if the lights go out. Other than that, I gave it 4 starts instead of 5, becuase we purchased it for my son't beta. While the beta loves the habitat, we cannot use the filter, because the suction is so strong, it tries to suck the beta's fins in, if he gets too close. I think it would be amazing for other types of fish.
customer_reviews.author: momma of 3

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic aquarium
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a replacement aquarium to our 1.5 gallon plastic one we bought at Walmart for my son's goldfish he won at a carnival. This Marineland 3 gallon contour glass aquarium had a lot of great reviews and I liked the size as I didn't want something too big. I love the fact that the pump and filter are hidden in a compartment at the back of the tank. The LED light with white light and blue light options is really cool as well. Was able to have the tank setup in no time and Fireball seems really happy with the added space. I highly recommend this aquarium.
customer_reviews.author: Lizard_13

customer_reviews.title: Not good long term
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tank for a beta in 2015. The filter is too strong and the tank it's self started leaking. The backing is peeling back. Not a great tank for long term use. I recommend getting a 3 or 5 gallon fish tank and adding a submersible water filter. It's half the cost too. My beta is still alive and thriving in his new fish bowl with filter.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Strong Filter, Hard to Clean
customer_reviews.text: The filter is stronger than expected, even at the lowest it was still affecting our betta's ability to swim freely around the tank. Also, the cover for the filter doesn't snap on, it just kind of sits in there. Tried placing some fabric over the output which worked for a short period but eventually started deteriorating. More frustrating, there is no way to remove the back panel, so cleaning inside the filter area is not possible without completely emptying the tank. Noticed some mold/algae growing rampant on the filter tube. These may not be issues for a different set up, but for a planted tank with a betta this was not a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Rudd

customer_reviews.title: Nice tank to start with
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tank & a v nice size to house your betta buddy. Why 4stars? The filter hood is kinda wonky w its fit & the glass top covers the tank a bit much, I just have it set back onto the filter cover.. I DEF like the sleekness of the glass curve. Doesn’t matter which tank you get, all directions are vague. I like the cube look vs the oblong tank look & think it presents more open space. Do I like it better or less than any of my other tanks? Meh, they all are working fine, fish seem happy, that makes me happy
customer_reviews.author: DKF

customer_reviews.title: Great product but needs setup instructions for novices
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy, thick glass. Fish seems to like it. Filter is quiet. Kids like the display lights. Only big minus is the lack of clear setup instructions. As someone who never owned a filter tank before, I had zero clue as to what tube went where and how to assemble the filter and ended up hunting down YouTube videos to get a clue. Fish is still alive, wasn't electrocuted or sucked into the filter, so I guess I got it right but no thanks to the manufacturer "instructions".
customer_reviews.author: NotFromHere

customer_reviews.title: Terrific for Single Beta
customer_reviews.text: My little guy is so happy in his new home that he keeps making bubble nests. The only reason this is not a 5 is because the backing is black, and if you have a dark Beta fish, like I do, you cannot see them in the tank! I needed to buy light colored plastic plants and a light colored rock to cover the back so I could see him. I believe there is a white colored back version of this unit, but it is more expensive, and usually out of stock. The shape and LED lights are very stylish, though. I have received many compliments on the tank.
customer_reviews.author: J Aquino-Dantona

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Aquarium
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son, who was given a goldfish that had outgrown his small bowl. I feel it with live plants, driftwood, and black sand. It is absolutely beautiful. It runs quiet, and has a very elegant look. Simple to use. We added some snails, a small crap, and 3 extra small fish to his goldfish. We’ve had it for a couple of months and not had to clean it out yet.u have changed the filter once and It seems to stay quiet fresh. So far I’m impressed.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Filter broke after 2 weeks of owning it
customer_reviews.text: I got this in June 22 an the filter is broke already it won’t hold water in the holding tank keeps shutting off an on 😡😡 I hope the company does the right thing and sends me a new one !! Otherwise I love this tank I love the look an everything about it just mad about the filter !
customer_reviews.author: TAETRA DOBOSH

customer_reviews.title: Filtration system too strong for elderly Betta
customer_reviews.text: My poor Jack Fish can't handle the suction of the filtration system on this tank, even at the lowest setting. Even on cranked all the way down, he gets pulled over to the side. I placed my old pump and bubbler behind the divider along with my tank heater and that seems to be moving enough water to keep it fresh and at the right temperature in the whole tank, but giving Jack a break from fighting the suction. Overall, the tank is gorgeous and Jack likes it, but his poor ol' fins just can't compete with the current.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Kremer Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Quality of water pump tubing is bad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this aquarium 4 months ago. today during a water change, I noticed that the elbows that connect the nozzle with the tubing coming from the water pump came apart. while trying to connect them together I noticed that it no longer fits tightly, so I had to fix it with zip ties in the meantime. I looked for replacement parts, but it seems that they are not available anywhere. I contacted customer support, so I will update this review according to how that goes.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel I

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, easy to assemble..... but not good for betta.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice little fish tank. The light is nice, but not too bright. The pump is very quiet. Very easy to assemble. My only complaint is that on the lowest pump setting, it is still too powerful for a betta. It still creates a current significant to him and it pushes him around. I angled it various ways and turned it down as far as possible and nothing helped, so I had to unplug the pump which means the filter is useless now...... But size, looks, and functionality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Webneko

customer_reviews.title: Awesome once I reassembled the filter pump! Flow dial was misaligned.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful little tank. Lighting is a bit sub par, but adequate for my betta. Hopefully enough to keep some plants alive. When I first set it up, the flow was WAY too strong for my betta, even on the lowest setting. He basically just huddled next/against the intake. I ended up removing one impeller blade, but it didn't help enough. I removed the cover once again thinking I would remove another blade, but noticed the flow control dial wasn't installed properly. If your flow is too strong, carefully pop the dial out and rotate it so the baffles make a more complete circle. In retrospect, I wish I had noticed this before maiming the impeller!
customer_reviews.author: SeanC

customer_reviews.title: Great value, quality product. Best small tank option.
customer_reviews.text: Love this aquarium! I upgraded to this 3 gallon from a smaller bowl for my betta fish. It was really easy to assemble and set up. I really like the extra blue lighting option, too. It’s constructed from one solid piece of glass and has a glass sliding lid. (good if you have cats!) I spent three hours comparing different smaller tank options and believe I made the right choice. I’ll probably get a 5 gallon one in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: Samsarazoe

customer_reviews.title: Modern, sleek, well built, and full of features!
customer_reviews.text: This aquarium looks awesome and works very well. The filter system is very ingenious and space saving. The LED light bar on top gives off a nice tone while providing sufficient light for live plants. Overall, you can tell it is a quality product. The pump also allows you to adjust the flow rate for different types of fish. I have a betta, so I turned it down all the way to its lowest setting and it seems to be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Eric L.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but defect in elbow for pump
customer_reviews.text: I unpacked the aquarium and quickly got everything setup as a new home for Karl Jr. Unfortunately, when we plugged everything in, the pump began squirting water out like a fountain. I took the pump out and dropped it into a large vase of water and turned it on. As you can see in the picture, there's a puncture or tear in the elbow attachment. Amazon is sending a replacement and I'm excited to finally get this working correctly.
customer_reviews.author: whiwo

customer_reviews.title: From 5 stars to 0 start
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking tank, easy to set up. Received it feb 17th 2020, motor stopped working April 8th 2020 :( It stated working again after shaking it and now may 20th it completely stopped working? I hope to contact marineland customer service and see if they will send me another motor?
customer_reviews.author: Jesus is Lord!

customer_reviews.title: The curved glass is beautiful. However
customer_reviews.text: I got the three gallon tank. The curved glass is beautiful. However, the light is so so cheap. And the cover that covers the back filter portion is so cheap it flies off. I also received a pump that was faulty. After one day of housing just one betta the water was cloudy. I will be investing in something a little better made! Such a bummer because the curved glass is very beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: crly_wsjhn

customer_reviews.title: My Betta could not be happier in his new home!
customer_reviews.text: My Betta loves his new home! I added a 15 watt grow lamp, Tetra thermometer, a digital temp gauge, several live plants, a floating log, a sinking log, a Buddha head, catappa leaves, after I treated the water and I have one very happy bubble nest blowing Betta boy!
customer_reviews.author: Mistress Ursula

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: The tank is great, looks really nice. We get a lot of compliments just on that. Perfect size for our beta. The filter works great but might be a bit strong, our beta was hiding behind his tree all day, then figured it out. So now we have a routine and he knows it well. At night, the light goes off and the filter goes on, he goes behind his tree. In the morning the light goes on and filter goes off, he immediately comes out and we feed him. He is now really happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Ross

customer_reviews.title: Pump tubing is spraying water onto the plastic cover
customer_reviews.text: EDIT- Have been in contact and marineland have sent out a replacement for the elbow on the pump. I can't seem to find a way to contact marineland directly & don't want to return the tank, my beta was in a small bowl while waiting for this as it is (previous tank developed a leak in the corner) I'm not sure what to do about the little fountain of water coming from the tubing on the pump *see attached videos
customer_reviews.author: Christy A. Jennings

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Really neat, I like it a lot, you just need to make 2 changes on it and it'll meet your expectations. Buy along this tank an Aquatop NP-302 Aquarium Submersible Pump (the one that comes with it is very cheap won't last much) and the lighting for a Wave-point 6-Inch 8-Watt Super Blue and Daylight Micro Sun LED High Output and you are good to go. You won't regret it BUT remember it's a 5 gallon tank, I have 2 snails a crab and 3 YellowTail Damselfish thriving in it (1 1/2 inch approx each one). Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Good price better than expected quality.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these to setup side by side and have to say am very pleased. They are glass which I like and they are an okay size for our Betta Fish. I did put a small piece of aquarium cell foam sponge on the filter outlet nozzle to reduce the water current and added my own filter media inside which is just me being me. They look awesome and the fish are doing very well.
customer_reviews.author: Yetimonster

customer_reviews.title: It was an easy set-up and I love how the filter has its ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute little nano tank. Looks really well planted. It was an easy set-up and I love how the filter has its own compartment, hidden behind the actual tank. I placed my heater in there as well and it's working out great. I will soon be adding my betta or an African dwarf frog. *The second photo I added is of a modification I made. I purchased a new light which will be much better for my plants.*
customer_reviews.author: Lemondrop_92

customer_reviews.title: Nice tank
customer_reviews.text: Love this compact tank. Perfect for my one beta! Clear view through sides except obviously on the curved corners. Filter is perfectly quiet. I have mine on low and it circulated well but could be turned up a pinch but downfall is it’s hard to get to the pump down the back of the tank. You have to pull it up by the cord and I feel I might break something. I haven’t mastered that yet. Filter is easy to change. Light is nice and bright showing the fishes colors nicely. It’s small-3 gal but perfect for a beta or one fish. Overall I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LBrick

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS IT! DO NOT BUY ANYTHING ELSE!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a tank for your Betta, this is it! Trust me, you will love it! And you can thank me later. I love it so much I bough 2!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Jong Lin

customer_reviews.title: Hey fishy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this fish tank for my daughter for her first fish. Its not very big so be cautious of how many plants/ornaments you put in there with your fish. We got her a betta which works perfect. I would only recommend small fish. The pump is a little over powering. I put it on the lowest possible setting as the fish seemed to get blown around with it. The lighting is pretty cool. Definitely like the moonlight setting.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Privitera

customer_reviews.title: Please check for small cracks in the glass upon delivery.
customer_reviews.text: If you order this item, check to make sure there are not any hairline cracks in the glass. We have been using ours since July. All of a sudden, it started leaking on one of the bottom corners. The tank was never moved, so there was no way it could have happened with us. The only thing i can figure is that there must have been a crack that we didn't inspect when we received it and it just got worse over the course of the 3 months we had it. I am very disappointed as my son spent his own money for this tank.
customer_reviews.author: carol lee

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and easy to maintain
customer_reviews.text: This aquarium was very simple to set up. The all in one construction of the glass without seams showing in the front is very attractive. My single betta is happy as a clam and blowing bubble nests. I really like the ease of maintaining it too. Ive had large 55 gallon aquariums and this is a snap to do a water change on! I also got a tiny heater like a wafer and put it in the back filter compartment. It keeps the water at 80 degrees consistently I would not hesitate to buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Sunni

customer_reviews.title: Beauty and the Warranty
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 3-gallon kit because of its good looks without much thoughts about the detail, warranty, and the company. After only two months of use, the LED light went out. I called the manufacturer, Marineland, and received a free LED replacement. They back up their product with a 2-year warranty and were easy to deal with. I am happy. This is a great company with a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Boba-San

customer_reviews.title: NOT 3 gallons
customer_reviews.text: First off the 3 gal. tank is not 3 gal. To the fill line it's 2 and a half gallons. With the back plate hiding the pump and filter, the swimable space for you fish is closer to 2 gallons. The filter setup is too strong for my betta, even on its lowest setting. After getting a few shrimp trapped in the back, I ripped the whole mess out. Regaining that back 2 inches of tank makes a big difference. Got the smallest in tank filter setup I could find and was able to add a bunch of decorations to make for a much better setup.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Seibert

customer_reviews.title: Ok aquarium.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that the heater can’t go in the back with filters and pump. And the top pieces don’t seem to fit very well. But it is the best 3 gallon aquarium I could find so I guess it’s ok.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fish tank! Not perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fish tank seems to be very well build (except of the black filter cover lid) looks nice perfect size for bettas aquascaping , the second concern is the led lights is pretty much useless . Beside those 2 problems nothing else. Some peoples were complaining about the water flow to be to strong , well you can regulate the pump has a dial from low to high. I will recommend this tank for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Leandro B.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this little tank
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, easy to use for beginners like me, beautiful to look at on my desk while working remotely all day during the pandemic, and my betta is happy in his new 3 gallon home. 2 minor complaints and could be improved: 1. Small black cover at the top back doesn't sit well on top of power cord. 2. Lifting the glass top for feeding is a bit awkward (you have to use your nails to be able to grip and lift the top). However the beauty of the tank makes up for my minor issues.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Leaked instantly
customer_reviews.text: Filled it and it started leaking passed down old tank so kinda screwed. Tried to get a discount on it to no avail thru amazon. They said to send it back but cant throw this beta in eith the other so I water welded it and thank god its holding. Tisk tisk amazon
customer_reviews.author: D Met

customer_reviews.title: Buy the 5 gal vs 3 gal on cosmetic appeal......more substanial presence with surrounding decor!
customer_reviews.text: Simply awesome!.......great quality, smart shape, elegant stand to allow quick dry off of any water splash (preserves supporting furniture finish). Looks best on a small table or surrounding since it's roughly 11" cubed shape is rather small for the 3 gal. I actually purchased a 5 gal version soon after the 3 gal purchase for one reason, one few/none have cited ie IT'S BETTER LOOKING (can add an awesome air bubbler, taller plants, decor etc.....not possible w 3 gal 'squat' size. The 3 & 5 gal is plenty large for my 1 betta, so it comes down to esthetics!.
customer_reviews.author: glenn b

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, sophisticated tank!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, high quality tank. The curved edges on the front add a very nice touch and makes the take look very high end. Also the curved edges are a lot easier to clean then your typical squared off edges! This tank looks very sophisticated due to the way it sits up on the stand and also the black back drop of the tank that hides the pump and filter. This adds a very sleak look. Also the lighting is very sufficient. The day light and then also the option to have the night time lighting is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: C. J.

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased three of these
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased three of these and have decided its the best for my Bettas. I also purchased a biOrb tank but have since dumped it as this is much easier to clean and observe my Bettas. I would purchase again but then I would have 4 of the same type of tank. Love the rail light option and use it often.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great small tank.
customer_reviews.text: I love this tank. The fish love this tank. It's a great tank. Be aware, the filter is by default set to the highest setting. This is great if you want your fish to live in a whirlpool. It is a powerful filter. If you need to lower it, pull it out (it connects to the bottom by suction cups) and there is a small dial on it to turn it to whatever setting works. You'll need a heater, but the filter, the stand, and the lights are included.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Reisner

customer_reviews.title: its very difficult  to clean tank behind partition
customer_reviews.text: I got a pregnant fish and the 2 little fishy went behind the partition and grew bigger and could swim back I only noticed by chance, so I had to remove all set up to free the fish. over all its has nice glass, and look very nice but knowing what I know now I would not get this unit
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Pictures say all
customer_reviews.text: Glass has scratch u can feel and see plus the light bar is all wonky and off cilter had live plants waiting for this aquarium now they’ll most likely die
customer_reviews.author: bobjoesmurf

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful aquarium.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this 3 gallon aquarium. It’s perfect for my beta. It comes with a water pump, filter and beautiful day and moon light feature. Very quiet and beautiful. Fits right on my desk. Love that the glass top slides for easy access for feeding.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Liberatore

customer_reviews.title: Lots of features but annoying to use.
customer_reviews.text: Good unit for the price & features. A bit flimsy with the top and filter cover which is annoying to deal with when setting up but, you get what you pay for. I do like that there is extra space in filter box for bio media.
customer_reviews.author: J-man

customer_reviews.title: Great tank
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tank the filter is great and easy to Change the filter. My only concern was the flow even at the lowest setting it’s pretty strong. My new beta loves it he swims into the flow and it sends him tumbling back he does it 4 times in a row. So I guess the flow is fine
customer_reviews.author: shelley

customer_reviews.title: Good aquarium with small problem
customer_reviews.text: The aquarium was great. My only issue was the pump. The dial on the pump continues to spin and it is difficult to set the speed. If you accidentally pump it during reinstall it can change the setting. I needed the lowest setting as the pump was sucking my beta fish to the wall. Overall I still like the tank and would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: B-randon

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love this tank. The curved glass really looks a lot better than an angular, caulked one. It's on the small side for more than one fish, but it beats a bowl on the kitchen counter. The filter aparatus is decent and moderately quiet. You'll have to baffle it for a betta fish as it's a little strong even on its lowest setting. The led lighting is pretty bright, and comes with white and blue settings. Planted it with some live plants and it's set to cycle well. My fish is pretty happy with it, so I am too.
customer_reviews.author: Ben J

customer_reviews.title: Broken after a month!
customer_reviews.text: I’m currently trying to figure out who to even contact to request a refund or replacement on a tank that almost killed my fish. Apparently the motor in the filter system is broken after a month of running perfectly, and the tank kept filling with oil. Aside from being extremely frustrated, I’m disappointed. The tank is a perfect size, and looks great. I really thought I’d hit the jackpot with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Fliss

customer_reviews.title: Good home for our Betta
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and clean. Plenty of room for all our Betta's goodies. I do wish the water pressure coming off the nozzle into the tank wasn't so strong though. Our poor little Betta has to stay at the bottom when its on and it sends all her food to the bottom of the tank before she can get it, so we only run it for a few hours a day. The lights are pretty bright so we don't really use them.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Love this little tank.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this tank for about 1 month but I love it. I wanted to get my betta fish a bigger tank and this one is perfect. He is now also living with some tetras and a couple of platy's. I love it has the built in filter and light on top that changes color. And so far the filter has kept the water really clean and crystal clear.
customer_reviews.author: LAS

customer_reviews.title: Great Tank But Has Minor Flaws
customer_reviews.text: I actually really love this tank, it’s really good accept for the fact that the top gets water droplets on it almost instantly, which keeps the light from fully going through to the water. It houses my beta three tetras and a goldfish. The glass is really thick and the tank is really beautiful. But over all it’s a great tank and has good room, just the droplets is the one thing. The tank is beautiful and the sound isn’t too bad, I personally like the sound. OVERALL If you don’t mind mild sound and the water droplets on the top, it should be a great tank for your beta or small fish such as tetras.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Powers

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Finally got around to putting in water today, and guess what???? It leaks in two places. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: beautiful tank with lots of leaks
customer_reviews.text: When I opened box, tank seemed already somewhat assembled. We completed assembly, and it was beautiful at first but as you can see, from overnight, already leaking terribly on whole left side. Very disappointed and daughter is so sad about it.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tank, quiet filter.
customer_reviews.text: This is our third betta fish tank and by far my favorite! Very easy to set up. Super quiet and the blue light is beautiful. The water flow does create a strong current, but I wedged a piece of filter foam (from Petsmart) into the water output and this has worked. I also have a plant directly in front of the filter intake, so the betta is not exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beginners - Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 year old with a baby Betta. She loves it. Easy to care for. Easy to maintain. Filter and pump work great. Quit and light controls are super easy to use. Strongly recommend this tank. Real glass with good quality filters!
customer_reviews.author: Viper75

customer_reviews.title: Sophisticated looks, quality build, innovative design!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic freshwater tank! It offers sophisticated looks, quality glass, and is very functional! Very innovative design. Doesn't take alot of room but holds enough water for 2-3 tropical fish. Great for a bedroom....might even be good for a living room if decorated the right way! This is one of the best Nano freshwater aquariums that I've seen. I have 2 neon tetras and do 20 percent (1gallon) water change every two weeks. It takes less than 5 minutes and is simple to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Savy shopper

customer_reviews.title: This 3-gallon aquarium makes a great home for my Betta fish
customer_reviews.text: This 3-gallon aquarium makes a great home for my Betta fish! The back housing is slightly cheaply made, but overall it's an excellent tank. The tank could be improved with a few additions: 1. You have 3 choices for the lighting: white and blue led lights, blue lights or no lights. I'd like to be able to have just the white lights on. 2. A way to easily turn off the pump for feeding time. If you do not the food goes all over the tank.
customer_reviews.author: Joe P

customer_reviews.title: This aquarium came packaged so wonderfully! After I got it out of the box ...
customer_reviews.text: This aquarium came packaged so wonderfully! After I got it out of the box I was thrilled at how beautiful it is! Not your ordinary clunky tank - really nice and crafted meticulously! I am putting a Betta in it eventually and am still looking for the right one. You will love the ease of set up and the gorgeous look of the tank and lights. The price was great - I may have another one in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great tank, very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this tank. It is very heavy duty glass, very good quality. The only drawback is that the water current is a bit strong for my beta fish but I placed a taller statue underneath the flow and that seems to help. It has been two weeks and the tank is very clean, the filter doesn't even look dirty. I was so tired of having to clean the tank weekly. This products is great.
customer_reviews.author: SGarner

customer_reviews.title: great tank for the price
customer_reviews.text: love this tank. bought it for my dorm room. super easy to clean filter. light attaches perfectly as well. The filter is quiet. The glass does not fog. The base is secure. All around great tank. Only critique would be that the glass cover doesn't really allow for the presence of an additional heater's cord to sit nicely. I had to thread it through the back part of the tank and under the light fixture in order for the glass top to fit on the tank. Otherwise, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: jupbell

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful 3 gallon tank
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful 3 gallon tank. If you're looking for a starter tank to put a few small fish in, this is great. It is a small tank, the picture makes it apear a little bigger than it is, but it's still a very well built tank. I got 3 dalmation mollies for mine and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: HavnFun

customer_reviews.title: Fish tank
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product I can only say nice things about this fish tank but it’s very much to small for me
customer_reviews.author: Bubbliciousbubbleyum

customer_reviews.title: Easy, small, efficient and manageable. Worth the few extra dollars for glass.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and manage. Was weirded out not having the have an air stone, but researched just needing to have the water move along the top and keep a good even water flow. I scaled the flow down to half which can be adjusted on the filter mother itself. The glass is staying nice and clear unlike the plastic tanks that developed a sort of haze/fog eventually. Also don't have to worry about lighting system being affected with water damage being outside the lid of the tank.
customer_reviews.author: RMF

customer_reviews.title: Decent fish tank
customer_reviews.text: So our first one that was sent the tube was cracked and the second one same thing. Now we have to call the manufacturer and have them send us the small rubber elbow piece that connects to the tube. The tank looks very nice after setting it up, especially with the blue light on.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Great Aquarium, Excellent Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Grandson for his 4th Birthday, this is a beautiful, quality piece, the lighting is amazing and it operates great. We have fish in it and with the filtering system, the tank stays crystal clear.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Rathbun

customer_reviews.title: Good tank
customer_reviews.text: Great little aquarium for the price. The filter is very strong, as other reviews have said, even at the lowest setting. I put a sponge over the output to lessen the blow which works just fine. So far so good. Water is crystal clear and my betta fish is loving it. The LED light is also very nice. Just kinda wish it wasn’t plastic. Also don’t forget to take the cartridge and plastic out of the hidden compartment before filling the tank...I forgot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this aquarium about three months and love it! The lights are great. The adjustable water flow was nice because the full power is too intense for my beta. The lowest doesn't keep it clean, but there is a nice middle ground. All around, would definitely buy again. I wish the black filter cover was actually attached as I'm always fighting it, but it's definitely not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Spaeth

customer_reviews.title: Great little tank
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing little tank. This is a well built tank with an excellent filter and really nice lighting. We bought this for our betta Millie. Honestly upgrading our betta to this larger tank has made life so much easier. We do not have to clean the tank as often now. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Michaelides

customer_reviews.title: Quite and eye pleasing tank with easy set up.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tank for a child in our family. It was easy to set up and the pump is strong. We have it on the lowest setting and works great. I saw some reviews say this tank was loud. Ours is really quiet we don’t even notice it at all. Overall we’re very pleased and glad we got this tank it’s a great glass tank and very eye pleasing. Was easily set up. Bought a 5lb bag of gravel and had a good bit left if anyone’s wonder about that.
customer_reviews.author: Shanda

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, faulty connector
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this aquarium for the looks but it came with a ripped connector for the output..would love a replacement connector..ill update when I've had this longer
customer_reviews.author: Om Betty

customer_reviews.title: If you don’t want to waste your money, do not buy this tank!!
customer_reviews.text: Filter pump elbow came broken, there’s no room for cords when using a water heater. The back plastic filter cover doesn’t fit or lay flat and there’s no way to get the filter motor out without yanking it up or shoving your whole hand into the water. The lights aren't that great and the glass cover doesn’t slide back easy to allow access to feeding. I spent over 100 on just a 3 gallon and the “hidden” filtration takes up almost half of it not giving the full 3 gallons. Waste of money, I would not recommend this to anyone who cares for their fish.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Danielle

customer_reviews.title: nice tank!
customer_reviews.text: I owned 2 tanks before this different brands and the pump always went out fast, I decided to give this one a try and I'm so glad I did! it's easy to clean, doesnt make a lot of noise and looks very nice!!
customer_reviews.author: lasteffyben

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Betta
customer_reviews.text: Beto the Betta is loving his new aquarium! He’s owning his space, swimming vibrantly and building a bubble nest. I took the nozzle off of the filter, to reduce the water force...it worked. He swims through the streaming water and built his bubble nest on that side of the tank. Highly recommend this tank for Bettas.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Morris

customer_reviews.title: A box for my fish
customer_reviews.text: Looked all over for a decent tank for a single Betta fish and finally bought this one. Am I happy with my purchase? Yes, yes I am. It's big enough to keep my bubble nesting blue baby happy without breaking the bank or taking up too much space in the apartment. The filter is pretty quiet and works really well with the one fish. The overhead light is also good, no dead LED's or other issues, despite what some other reviews state. Add a small heater and this is a very complete tank system.
customer_reviews.author: barry lee remmen

customer_reviews.title: Very good betta tank
customer_reviews.text: Great small tank for my betta. Turn pump to low and put betta leaf in front of flow piece and the betta loves it. Take the filter holder out and replace with bio foam. Heater fits in back section.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved marineland products and this tank is no exception. I also have the five gallon version and they are both exceptional in quality. Great for beginners and hobbyists alike. Only downside is the light it comes with is only suitable for low light live plants.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson S.

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR SMALL SHRIMP!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for neocardinal shrimp. THEY ALL CAN ESCAPE THROUGH THE FILTER SLITS!! DO NOT PURCHASE THIS FOR SMALL SHRIMP, it’s a nightmare of unequivocal proportions.
customer_reviews.author: Mattyboy

customer_reviews.title: Add this prefilter for beta
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tank for a single beta fish! It needs a heater so don’t forget that. I added a prefilter sponge to lessen the water flow so it doesn’t blow my beta around the tank. They don’t like much flow.
customer_reviews.author: Productwiz99

customer_reviews.title: It’s OK
customer_reviews.text: Cute for a Community tank but I have only 1 beta fish in it and can’t use the filter because he gets sucked in and can’t move other then that my fish is happy in there . Obviously we don’t use the filter
customer_reviews.author: frances berga

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and good for small fish
customer_reviews.text: It is super nice and quite too however the flow of the water may be a bit too much for my betta. I only have a betta in the tank but I like that it had a built in light too.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for shrimp tank
customer_reviews.text: I could see this good for a beginner fish tank. However, this tank is not ideal for shrimps. It is so easy for the shrimps to get sucked into the filter area. I tried everything like adding sponges and mesh but the cartridge holder's design did not allow things to fit perfectly inside. Although I reduced the filter to the lowest setting, I still ended up with 3 dead shrimps getting sucked into the back.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe N.

customer_reviews.title: Pump died after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Pump died after three months. Beautiful aquarium, great design but the hardware really should last longer than that. Now I’ll have to hunt down a pump that will fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: perfect tank for a betta !
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tank for my betta fish! he absolutely loves it. the only thing that he has to get used to is the current cause he’s not used to it. the only thing that’s a lil aggravating is the black plastic top to cover the filter. it’s a lil warped and won’t stay on well but other than that it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Faith Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and unique. It’s not perfect like anything else. It has a small chip on the corner but nothing worth returning. Smaller then I pictured but cute for my bedroom or any desk space. I love the outcome although I purchased a log that was too tall I can’t close it with the glass top but it still looks cool with the log sticking out. I would definitely purchase the 5 gallon next for another room.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Beginner friendly tank
customer_reviews.text: Love this tank! It is perfect for beginners. It was very easy to set up. I bought the spongebob pineapple and figure from Walmart before I even got the tank. They jelly fish and groot figure are from amazon. We bought replacement filters, a heater and water conditioner for betas, also from Amazon. We have 3 fish and a snail in the tank. This tank is so pretty and beginner friendly. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet pump
customer_reviews.text: Set it up in less than 10 mins. Super quiet pump. I was worried the pump would be audible, but you can't hear it at all. Saw this set up from another user and liked the zen feel of his talk so I set mine up just like his to release stress while at work. So peaceful. Pump set to lowest setting but it still seems to push the Betta around.
customer_reviews.author: V. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Great small aquarium. Very nice see thru glass and thick. Great product for the price. Tray that covers filter area doesnt fit, however you cant physically tell. Great filter even comes with a small about 1 inch stand to place aquarium on. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Rico von Cool

customer_reviews.title: Works great very quiet
customer_reviews.text: I love that everything is compact and hidden, it's very quiet. The LED lighting with the dual mode is a great features. I put it in my cart to think about it, then saw that the price had dropped to $37. that was the deciding factor.
customer_reviews.author: EK Monterey

customer_reviews.title: Filter stopped working
customer_reviews.text: This tank worked well for about 5 months. We ran the filter 24/7. Last Tuesday I unplugged it to change the water and clean the tank (which I try to do every 2 weeks or so). When I went to pug it back in, it didn't start up. The filter motor must be dead. I have been too busy to check super close, but it doesn't appear like the filter motor can be removed. We might just end up having to buy a stand alone filter to hang from the side of the take. Defiantly wont look as nice and will probably require the lid to be removed:( Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

product_meta.title: MarineLand Contour Glass Aquarium Kit with Rail Light
product_meta.description:
Size:3-GallonFor more than 40 years, Marineland has been committed to fishkeeping success. By applying biological science, advanced engineering and imagination to fishkeeping, Marineland continues to be the leader in innovative aquatic environments & equipment. Today, that spirit of innovation is alive and well at Marineland. Whatever your passion — fresh or saltwater, big or small — count on Marineland to bring you the most reliable, the most technically advanced, the highest quality aquariums and accessories on the market. This 3-gallon kit features Marineland 3-stage hidden filtration with a Rite-SizeTM Z Cartridge and Marineland Bio-Foam (included in the kit), and include an adjustable flow filter pump. Bright white and blue energy efficient LED lights feature a 3-way switch (toggle between white and blue, off, and blue-only settings). The white LEDs create a shimmering light in the water that mimics the underwater effect of sunlight, and the blue LEDs produce a relaxing moonlight glow. The kits feature either a hinged or sliding glass canopy for easy feeding and water care dosing. These easy-to-assemble kits are beautifully designed and easy to maintain.

AMAZON.COM


Hidden Filtration Natural Daylight Effect:
Bright white LEDs create 
shimmering light that mimics the 
natural underwater effect of sunlight. EASILY START YOUR NEW AQUARIUM
The Marineland Contour Aquarium Kit with Rail Light provides a quick and stylish foundation for starting your new aquarium. The 3 gallon kit features curved glass and an LED lighting system that uses bright white and blue LEDs to show off the aquarium in the best possible light with both daylight and moonlight settings. Advanced 3-stage filtration keeps the aquarium clean and healthy with an adjustable flow filter pump and one included RITE-SIZE Z Filter Cartridge. The sleek, contour design of this kit stylishly hides the filtration and features a hinged light that allows for easy access to the tank.

LED LIGHTING SYSTEM
The Marineland Contour Aquarium Kit includes an LED lighting system that is energy efficient and money saving. These bright white and blue LEDs feature two settings that show off your aquarium in the best light and are mounted on a hinged light that offers easy access to the tank.

Moonlight Effect: 
Blue LEDs provide a relaxing 
moonlight glow for aquarium
enjoyment in the day or evening. GLASS CANOPY PROVIDES EASY ACCESS
Each Marineland Contour Aquarium kit features an easy-to-use glass canopy that slides back over your aquarium filter to provide a gap for daily feeding and water care additions. This canopy also prevents fish from jumping and helps to maintain your aquarium’s water temperature.

Stylish Look & Feel ADVANCED FILTRATION
The Marineland Contour Aquarium Kit comes complete with 3-stage filtration that works to provide a clean and healthy aquatic environment. Each kit includes an adjustable flow filter pump.

MECHANICAL FILTRATION
 * Filter cartridge floss screens out dirt and debris
 * Molded ribbed back for maximum water-to-carbon contact

CHEMICAL FILTRATION
 * Activated carbon inside filter cartridge removes odors, discolorations, and impurities

BIOLOGICAL FILTRATION
 * Bio-Foam creates a large 3-dimensional area for cultivating aerobic bacteria, which eliminate toxic ammonia and nitrite
 * No need to replace

EXPLORE MORE PRODUCTS FROM TETRA
CLICK AN IMAGE TO SEE MORE
Water Care Maintaining the optimal water chemistry in your new aquarium is vital to its success. Tetra’s complete line of Water Care liquids makes it easy to condition, dechlorinate, add beneficial filter bacteria, and remove ammonia and nitrite. Expert Feeding Feeding your fish a well-balanced diet can help to ensure health and vitality. It is important to never overfeed and to feed your fish a supplemental food in addition to your staple flake. Heat & Aerate Adding an air pump to your new aquarium is especially important for optimal fish health. An aquarium heater is essential for keeping tropical fish. Decorate To decorate your new tank, Marineland recommends adding 5-10 pound of gravel and adding plants, ornaments, and rocks for your fish to explore Filter Each Marineland Silhouette Aquarium Kit includes one RITE-SIZE Z Filter cartridge. Keep a supply of filter cartridges handy and replace every 2-4 weeks to maintain active carbon. TetraCare Need help or have questions about your new Aquarium? TetraCare offers free advice and support as well as helpful e-minders and tips.
feature_bullets: Focused on the healthy living of your aquatic pets
Quality designed and tested for highest performance
Don't Settle for anything less, use Aquaria Products

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
